Shrublord.ForageAddon_Daisy.name: Daisy
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Daisy.description: A very common flower that blooms almost all year.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Violet.name: Violet
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Violet.description: A common flower that blooms in early spring.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Wild_Garlic.name: Wild Garlic
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Wild_Garlic.descri: This plant looks very similar to the poisonous lily of the valley, but is easily distinguishable by smell.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Rapeseed.name: Rapeseed
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Rapeseed.descripti: A plant that has been pressed for oil since ancient times.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Shaggy_Inkcap.name: Shaggy Inkcap
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Shaggy_Inkcap.desc: The mushroom must be eaten soon after harvest, as it turns bitter fast.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Black_Trumpet_Mush: It's scientific name, 'Craterellus cornucopioides', is named after an ancient symbol of plenty.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Porcini.name: Porcini
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Porcini.descriptio: The porcini is held in high regard in many cuisines.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Whitebeam_Pome.des: An edible relative of the rowan berry.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Gentian.name: Gentian
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Gentian.descriptio: A rare flower found in mountainous regions.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Oyster_Mushroom.de: A fungus that preys on small worms.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Autumn_Crocus.name: Autumn Crocus
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Autumn_Crocus.desc: A deadly poisonous flower that blooms in early fall.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Sweet_Chestnut.des: The fruit of the chestnut tree.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Rhododendron.name: Rhododendron
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Rhododendron.descr: In floriography, the rhododendron symbolizes danger.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Gooseberry.name: Gooseberry
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Gooseberry.descrip: A sweet relative of the currants.
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Chickweed.name: Chickweed
Shrublord.ForageAddon_Juniper_Berry.name: Juniper Berry
